name: DevonWay
overview: DevonWay, Inc. designs and develops on-demand nuclear business management solutions. It offers business management solutions, including asset and workforce management, configuration management, corrective action program, data and documents w/controlled distribution, construction project management, executive KPI dashboards, inventory and warehouse management, supply chain and contract management, time entry and labor distribution, 2-way interfaces, budget and commitment spending, knowledge management and succession planning, and regulatory recording and reporting functionalities. The company provides its solutions by using software-as-a-service and on-site platforms. DevonWay also offers Silver Bullet, a development architecture and toolset that supports transformation of legacy data and business rules in browser-class environments to render SOA compliant business process applications; and ObservationWay, a solution to administer, manage, and analyze observation programs for utilities. It serves nuclear, energy, and utilities industries. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in San Francisco, California.

funding_rounds.source_description: DevonWay Closes C Series Funding Led By Crosslink Capital
